title: The Third Post
content: Frederick is post offwind.  Orphan.  Lonely.  Solitary seclusion steadifies. In the intersection of the traverse where eons ebb and flow.  Blank faces pass by.  Limbs scramble in frenetic fashion.  Eyes empty.  Lips hard pressed.  Each face cast of stone.  I sit.  Alone.

title: Unknown
content: Etch easily in clay tablets the words of dreams uttered by Yog-Soggoth through the tongue of mad priests.  A thousand eyes in one face watch all threads and a thousand fingers pluck strands of the silk spun web.  Violen shrieks sing as time shifts into nether.  We live, forget, live, repeat, forget again, stare off into the distance, remember the essence of what once was but is not present.  Adjacent to these thoughts sings the siren.  Calling me to depths where I will find the sleeping city and be as I was shaped.
